name: AzureDevOpsWikiToDocFx-dev
description: This task creates a DocFX website out of your Azure DevOps wiki repository
author: Monta

inputs.name: SourceFolder
inputs.label: Source Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Where the Azure DevOps wiki files are located.

inputs.name: TargetFolder
inputs.label: Target Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Where the DocFX project should be written. It should not yet exist.

inputs.name: AudienceKeywords
inputs.label: Audience Keywords (comma seperated)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The keywords used to specify one or more audience for a page or part of a page. Example for specifying audiences for part of a page: [[Audience: Customers, Staff This content is only visible for customers and staff.]]. If an audience is specified on the first of the file, the file will not be included if the audiences do not match.

inputs.name: TargetAudience
inputs.label: Target Audience
inputs.helpMarkDown: Audience to target. If left empty, files or part of files with a audience specified will not be included.
